Comment: It's time for Europe and Ukraine to see the US under the Trump regime for what it is - a non-ally.  They align with Russian interests, if not Russia itself, they are seeking politically acceptable ways to withdraw any support for Ukraine, and will not defend NATO if required.  In fact, they threaten action, including militarily, against a NATO nation with posturing over Greenland.  We may start with a trial separation but the divorce is coming.  And I think the US is going to be asked to leave bases in European countries during this administration.    As an American, we're abandoning allies and disrupting the political order that has largely kept a level of peace in the post-WWI period.  Trump is ending it.  It's embarrassing, wrong, and the risk here is stunning.  But we can also accept the reality and act accordingly.  And hope to exist until sanity can be restored, but even then, the US will no longer be trusted.  For good reason.
